Temporary Lead Time Increase for RCV Valves | February 12, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
Temporary Lead Time Increase for Research Control® Valves Standing by commitments to our customers is of the highest priority for Badger Meter. Due to an increase in valve orders, we are temporarily increasing lead times for standard and special orders for Research Control® Valves. If there are critical time frames for specific orders, please contact our sales department. We will do our best to offer the Hot Shot delivery service according to our current stated policy found in the RCV Price List, but we ask for your cooperation in using this expediting process for the highest priority orders. If you have any questions, please contact your sales representative or customer service. Sincerely, Brian Kettner Marketing Manager RCV-Research Control Valves and Preso
